pair.subtitle_nas_data: Set the IP address and port to connect to your NAS. Use the SSL-Port of your QTS access
pair.subtitle_user_data: In the next step, enter your NAS user. It is recommended to create a new user with admin group assignment without additional rights (apps, shares) and without 2FA (two-factor authentication).
pair.subtitle_loading_error_1: The app could not retrieve NAS system data.
pair.subtitle_loading_error_3: It is recommended to create a new NAS user for Homey with the following settings:

device_unavailable_reason.auth_error: Authentication error or missing user rights.
device_unavailable_reason.connection_error: Connection error. Device offline or IP/port settings are wrong
